name: shareid-sdk-ios
summary: SDK for integrating identity verification features into your iOS applications.
description:
ShareID SDK provides seamless integration for identity verification within iOS applications. 
It offers secure and efficient methods for scanning, verifying, and authenticating users' identity documents.
